title: Software Engineering Intern
description: We are seeking a motivated Software Engineering Intern to join our dynamic development team. You will work on real-world projects, collaborate with experienced engineers, and contribute to building scalable web applications. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in modern software development practices.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using React and Python
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and team meetings
Collaborate with designers and product managers
Debug and fix issues in existing codebase
Write unit tests for new features
preferred_qualifications: Experience with AWS or cloud platforms
